item.title: (Python) Styling Guide (PEP8)
item.description: You can read it here. To start following it, install locally pycodestyle package and run it through your code. ~> pip install pycodestyle ~> pycodestyle --ignore=E501 run.py run.py:15:1: E302 expected 2 blank lines, found 1# main parser = argparse.ArgumentParser() parser.add_argument("action", choices=['list', 'add', 'search', 'import'], help="list local repositories, add new one or search by tags") parser.add_argument("--url", nargs='?', help="url of repository to add") parser.add_argument("--note", nargs='?', help="personal note about repository") parser.add_argument("--tags", nargs='?', help="tags for repository") parser.
